<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}

  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Request for a base64-encoded unsigned transaction to create a Dynamic Bonding Curve pool with token metadata

:::note
Refer to [Studio API doc](/docs/studio-api) for more information
:::


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["buildCurveByMarketCapParam","antiSniping","tokenName","tokenSymbol","tokenImageContentType","creator"],"properties":{"buildCurveByMarketCapParam":{"type":"object","required":["quoteMint","initialMarketCap","migrationMarketCap","tokenQuoteDecimal","lockedVestingParam"],"properties":{"quoteMint":{"type":"string","description":"- Quote mint address\n- Either USDC, SOL, or JUP\n","example":"EPjFWdd5AufqSSqeM2qN1xzybapC8G4wEGGkZwyTDt1v"},"initialMarketCap":{"type":"number","description":"- Initial market cap in quote token units\n- 16000 passed in = 100 USDC/SOL/JUP initial market cap\n","example":16000},"migrationMarketCap":{"type":"number","description":"- Migration market cap in quote token units\n- 69000 passed in = 69000 USDC/SOL/JUP migration market cap\n","example":69000},"tokenQuoteDecimal":{"type":"number","enum":[6,9],"description":"- Token quote decimal places\n"},"lockedVestingParam":{"type":"object","required":["totalLockedVestingAmount","cliffUnlockAmount","numberOfVestingPeriod","totalVestingDuration","cliffDurationFromMigrationTime"],"properties":{"totalLockedVestingAmount":{"type":"number","description":"- Total locked vesting amount of tokens (0% to 80% of total supply)\n","example":100000000},"cliffUnlockAmount":{"type":"number","description":"- Amount of tokens unlocked at cliff\n","example":20000000},"numberOfVestingPeriod":{"type":"number","description":"- Number of vesting periods in months\n","example":12},"totalVestingDuration":{"type":"number","description":"- Total vesting duration in seconds\n","example":31536000},"cliffDurationFromMigrationTime":{"type":"number","description":"- Cliff duration from migration time in seconds\n","example":2592000}}}}},"antiSniping":{"type":"boolean","description":"- Enable anti-sniping protection\n- Apply an additional swap fee immediately after launch to discourage bots\n- Starts at 99% and decreases 1% linearly over a randomized period\n"},"isLpLocked":{"type":"boolean","description":"- Whether LP tokens should be locked\n- If enabled, 50% of graduated LP unlocks after 1 year\n- Useful for creators to strategize in the long term\n","default":true},"tokenName":{"type":"string","minLength":1},"tokenSymbol":{"type":"string","minLength":1},"tokenImageContentType":{"type":"string","description":"- Token image content type\n","enum":["image/jpeg","image/png","image/gif","image/webp"]},"creator":{"type":"string","description":"- Creator wallet public key\n"}},"title":"CreateDBCTransactionRequestBody"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["transaction","mint","imagePresignedUrl","metadataPresignedUrl","imageUrl"],"properties":{"transaction":{"type":"string","description":"Base64-encoded transaction ready for signing"},"mint":{"type":"string","description":"Generated token mint address"},"imagePresignedUrl":{"type":"string","format":"uri","description":"Presigned URL for image upload"},"metadataPresignedUrl":{"type":"string","format":"uri","description":"Presigned URL for metadata upload"},"imageUrl":{"type":"string","format":"uri","description":"Final image URL"}},"title":"CreateDBCTransactionResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"errors":{"type":"object"},"error":{"type":"string"}}}}}},"500":{"description":"Internal server error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string"},"details":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
